class.name: Path2D
class.brief_description: Contains a [Curve2D] path for [PathFollow2D] nodes to follow.
class.description: Can have [PathFollow2D] child nodes moving along the [Curve2D]. See [PathFollow2D] for more information on usage. [b]Note:[/b] The path is considered as relative to the moved nodes (children of [PathFollow2D]). As such, the curve should usually start with a zero vector ([code](0, 0)[/code]).

members.member: if [code]false[/code], the path lines will not draw in editor (has no effect in game).
